mapper.select: /* findCalCreateInfoByCalSeq */ SELECT TSC.CREATE_SEQ AS createSeq, TSC.CREATE_DATE AS createDate FROM T_SC_CAL TSC WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSC.CAL_SEQ = #{calSeq} AND TSC.USE_YND = 'Y'

/* findCalUsersInfoByCalSeq */ SELECT IFNULL(TSCU.CAL_SEQ, '') AS calSeq, IFNULL(TSCU.CDE_SEQ, '') AS cdeSeq, IFNULL(TSCU.CDE_TYPE, '') AS cdeType, IFNULL(TSCU.CAL_PARTITION_TYPE, '') AS calPartitionType, IFNULL(TSCU.CAL_AUTORITY, '') AS calAutority, IFNULL(TSCU.USE_YND, '') AS useYnd, DATE_FORMAT(TSCU.CREATE_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') AS createDate, IFNULL(TSCU.CREATE_SEQ, '') AS createSeq, CASE WHEN TSCU.MODIFY_DATE IS NOT NULL THEN DATE_FORMAT(TSCU.MODIFY_DATE, '%Y%m%d%H%i') ELSE '' END AS modifyDate, IFNULL(TSCU.MODIFY_SEQ, '') AS modifySeq FROM T_SC_CAL_USER TSCU WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSCU.CAL_SEQ = #{calendar.calSeq} AND TSCU.USE_YND = 'Y' AND TSCU.CAL_PARTITION_TYPE != '100' AND TSCU.CAL_AUTORITY != 'M'

/* updateSingleCal */ UPDATE T_SC_CAL TSC SET TSC.CAL_TITLE = #{calender.calTitle}, TSC.CAL_TYPE = #{calender.calType}, TSC.CAL_CONTENT = #{calender.calContent}, TSC.CAL_COLOR = #{calender.calColor}, TSC.MODIFY_DATE = NOW(), TSC.MODIFY_SEQ = #{emp.empSeq} WHERE 1 = 1 AND TSC.CAL_SEQ = #{calender.calSeq} AND TSC.USE_YND = 'Y'
